message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $1100000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your initial offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I was thinking of a price more around $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1050000. This is a compromise that I believe still reflects the product's worth, while also showing my willingness to negotiate.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1025000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
